programme.desc: The Tro Breizh, a 1,500 km pilgrim trail, crosses the Forest of Broceliande, explores idyllic bays and climbs the Monts d'Arree hills. Created in the Middle Ages, to encourage the faithful to pray to Brittany's founding saints, today heritage enthusiasts are working to put it back in the spotlight.

Today it connects Huahine, Raiatea, Tahaa, Bora-Bora and Maupiti to Tahiti.

programme.title: Movie - Vaathi
programme.desc: Assigned to a government school as a teacher, a young professor encounters several obstacles in his fight against people trying to turn the sacred pillar of education into a business.

programme.title: Movie - Kadhal
programme.desc: A mechanic elopes to Chennai with a rich schoolgirl, but the girl's persistent family won't leave them alone. Soon, the married couple is deceptively separated and the schoolgirl is married to someone else.

programme.title: Movie - Kudumba Changili
programme.desc: Kudumba Sangili is a 1999 Tamil-language film directed by P. N. Ramachandar. The film stars the producer Kalaipuli G. Sekaran alongside Khushbu, while Manivannan plays a supporting role.

programme.title: Movie - Kulir 100
programme.desc: Surya's mother enrols him to an elite school in a bid to separate him from his rowdy past. Being a misfit, he only has Babloo and the principal's daughter by his side. Soon, Babloo is found dead.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Find out all about the top goods and services as shown on television, with consumers being able to place orders for these products.

programme.title: Movie - Jananam

programme.title: Movie - Anbulla Kamal
programme.desc: Roy, Soorya, Amir and Gauri, four individuals who suffer from a terminal disease, become friends. They embark on a journey to meet Soorya's girlfriend and gain a positive outlook on life.

programme.title: Movie - Naan Petha Mahaney
programme.desc: Aandal, a possessive mother, sabotages her son's love life by attempting suicide. When she gets him married to a village girl, her possessiveness resurfaces.

programme.title: Movie - Rudhra
programme.desc: Mayandi kills inspector Gopal and his family except for Rudhra, who finds evidence against him and shows it to the police. However, when an officer begins torturing her, Rudhra vows to kill Mayandi.

programme.title: Movie - Vasool Raja MBBS
programme.desc: A goon, Rajaram, enrols himself in a medical college to fulfill his father's dream. He defies the college rules and creates problems for Dr Vishwanathan.

programme.title: Movie - Chennai 600028
programme.desc: The Sharks team never wins the local cricket tournament. However, things take a turn when Raghu, a player from the opposition team, decides to join them.

programme.title: Movie - Kuppi
programme.desc: After the assassination of a prominent leader, Shivrasan takes shelter in a house owned by Ranganath. When the police zero in on the hideout after thorough investigation, they get attacked.

programme.title: Movie - Maalai Pozhuthin Mayakathilaey
programme.desc: A real-time playout of events at a coffee shop over nearly two hours on a rainy evening. A married couple fight over the lack of romance in their lives, while it blossoms between two strangers just a table away.

programme.title: Movie - Sundara Purushan

programme.title: Movie - Maya

The CONMEBOL Sudamericana began in 2002, replacing the separate competitions Copa Merconorte and Copa Mercosur (that had replaced Copa CONMEBOL) by a single competition.

programme.title: FS MMA Jakub Wikalacz vs. Sebastian Przybysz
programme.desc: This episode of FIGHT SPORTS MMA showcases action from KSW 77 in Gliwice, Poland, when 13-3-1 Jakub Wiklacz takes on 10-2 Champion Sebatian Przybysz in the rubber match of their trilogy, this time for the KSW Bantamweight Championship. Wiklacz was victorious in their first meeting five years earlier, before dropping the rematch to Przybysz by stoppage just two years ago.

programme.title: WCCB Artur Beterbiev vs. Isidro Ranoni Prieto
programme.desc: From the Lac Leamy Casino in Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, NABA Light Heavyweight Champion Artur Beterbiev looks to continue his streak of knockout victories and secure a shot at the World Title as he steps into the ring against Isidro Ranoni Prieto (26-1, 22 KOs). Beterbiev, the Russian Olympian and Gold Medalist from the World Championships in Milan, enters the fight with a record of 10-0, not allowing any of his opponents to reach the final bell.

programme.title: Introducing:
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS Presents 'Introducing:', a new original documentary series that covers the current stars of today and rising stars of tomorrow. Each episode we get an up close and personal perspective of their lives and see what drives them to be the best at what they do. Introducing: Caitlin Dechelle, provides an intimate look at one of the most dominant women in the history of martial arts tournaments.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode, we see the best of the Judo Grand Slam from Paris as some of the 2016 Olympics' finest athletes battle for their shot at glory.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paul Williams vs. Carlos Quintana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-undefeated Paul Williams defending his welterweight championship against Carlos Quintana. The fight's result ultimately ended up being what might be considered one of the biggest upsets in boxing.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2 featuring Kakuryu, Goeido, Tochinoshin, Onosho from the Hatsu basho, 2018.

programme.desc: Episode 4: Seoul, South Korea - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Hapkido and the Martial Art of Feet, Hands and Throws featuring Masters Kim Nam Je, Bae Sung Book and Ju Soong Weo.

programme.title: WCCB Kim Clavel vs. Evelin Bermudez
programme.desc: The WBO %26 IBF Light Flyweight World Championship will be at stake when Kim Clavel steps into the ring in her home of Laval, Quebec, Canada to challenge the champion Evelin Bermudez of Argentina. The former WBC World Champion, Clavel boasts a 17-1 record, recently rebounding from a decision loss to Yesica Nery Plata where she dropped her title.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode we look at different weapons used throughout the martial arts and the technology used to make them stronger and more efficient.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Fukuoka, Japan welcomes the top talent in the world of martial arts when Karate 1 Premier League returns. Fukuoka will host athletes from across the globe including last season's Grand Winners such as Hikaru Ono and Ayaka Saito competing in their home country. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League visits the port city of Fukuoka, Japan, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Joe Calzaghe vs. Roy Jones, Jr.
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light heavyweight championship fight featuring Joe Calzaghe and Roy Jones, Jr. This epic bout would prove to be the last of Calzage's career. Many wanted him to retire because he had nothing left to prove, and Calzaghe would officially do so 3 months later. Also on the card, Chris Arreola shows everyone why he is a heavyweight contender.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Hakuho, Daieisho, Kaisei and Ichinojo from the Hatsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Return to the Ring Rocky Gannon vs. Dominick Carter
programme.desc: Delivering the untold stories behind some of the most exciting fights in the sport, FIGHT SPORTS brings you 'Return to the Ring'. In this original documentary series, we sit with the participants from some of boxing's most interesting bouts, including the fighters, trainers, officials and promoters that contributed to each event.

programme.title: FS MMA Tama Chan vs. Jan Finney
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Jan "Cuddles" Finney faces off against Tama Chan where Finney looks to put the squeeze on Japan's Tama Chan in Costa Rica.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Victor Ortiz vs. Marcos Rene Maidana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a battle of knockout artists as Victor Ortiz, entering with eight straight knockout wins, faces Marcos Maidana, who has knockouts in 24 of his 25 victories. The winner of this bout will be crowned the interim WBA light welterweight champion.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo

programme.title: Bipolar Rock n' Roller
programme.desc: A raw and unflinching account of Mauro Ranallo's decades-long struggle with Bipolar Affective Disorder. The voice of WWE and Showtime Championship Boxing, Ranallo has called some of the biggest sports events in history - all the while fighting his own epic battles with mental health Follow his journey in this 3-part series, as he combats the stigma behind mental health issues and sheds light on what it's like being at the top of the industry despite seemingly insurmountable odds.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features two-time UFC champion and Hall of Famer Randy "The Natural" Couture and his buddies firing up their motorcycles for a good cause, plus an interview with one of MMA's biggest stars, "Rowdy" Ronda Rousey. programme.desc: Four Corners is the home of Australian investigative journalism. These fearless and forensic documentaries expose scandals, trigger inquiries, fire debate and confront taboos.

programme.title: Media Watch (2024) - EP 37
programme.desc: Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment, bringing you a brave and fearless critique of the week's journalism, issues and events in the news. Presented by Paul Barry.

programme.title: The Human Revolution S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Trace the human story back through deep time to discover who our ancient cousins really were, and what they can tell us about our own story.

programme.title: 7.30 (2024) - EP 166
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: The World (2024) - EP 170
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. At 9pm AEDT, Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast (2024) - EP 213
programme.desc: Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and today's top stories. Michael Rowland and Bridget Brennan bring you news and interviews, joined by Charles Brice with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2024) - EP 213
programme.desc: When big stories break, turn to Gemma Veness in the morning to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2024) - EP 213

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Tyler Mathisen and Kelly Evans take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Tyler Mathisen and Kelly Evans take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Lady Killers
programme.desc: British crime writer, Martina Cole, examines the life and times of the most notorious female serial killers across history and asks: why do women kill and why are we surprised when they do?

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: The World From Above S2
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: Hopeful Earth
programme.desc: This series travels around the world to meet the people who create the energies of tomorrow through unusual ideas. An extraordinary journey in 8 different countries to unearth imaginative solutions to the present energy and environmental issues.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Earth On Edge
programme.desc: Documentary series about the climate crisis. We travel to Iceland, Greenland, Denmark, Japan and California to explore the effects of a warming planet. While the situation is dire, there is hope. Brilliant minds are coming up with solutions that could show us a new way. As we stand on the edge, what is our next step?

programme.title: Tabula Rasa S3
programme.desc: A religious program that preached by Abu Marlo. He is a former magician that currently become an Indonesian motivator.

programme.title: Sea Morning Show (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Morning Show delivers up to-date news, live reports, talk shows and features about Indonesia and also Southeast Asia which airs daily 6 - 9 am.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: Luxe Asia
programme.desc: In the new season, Asia's most exclusive series returns to showcase the finest experiences and most luxurious living trends in the region. From the Waldorf Hotel in Shanghai, to Singapore's multi-billion dollar luxury goods market including custom made suits, cars and jets, Luxe Asia provides exclusive insight into Asia's high life.

programme.title: Bulletproof
programme.desc: From a quadriplegic adrenaline junkie getting his paragliding licence, to a double-amputee organizing ski camps, this is a series of stories about inspiring people whose lives have been turned upside down and then re-built as a consequence of a tragic accident. We revisit the accident scene to understand what happened, and learn about their recoveries.

programme.title: Impact: Stories Of Asia
programme.desc: This series celebrates these triumphs through moving illustrations of the power of human will against adversity. Whilst providing a holistic portrait of poverty issues across Asia ranging from HIV in Cambodia to desertification in Mongolia, the series also presents a myriad of workable solutions, ranging from micro-financing to slum development to educational and cultural preservation initiatives.

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: No Luggage Asia
programme.desc: From the stunning natural beauty of the Maldives, Sri Lanka and Bali to the pagodas of Cambodia, cherry blossom season in Japan and the temples of Myanmar, this strand of the No Luggage franchise gives viewers an up close and personal experience of local life, religious practices and flora and fauna in each destination.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Travel Quest is an eco travel adventure series showcasing some of the most exciting, exotic and often dangerous places in earth Host Bill Ball, a true " challenges himself in each episode as he attempts to check an adventure, thrill or rare animal off his personal bucket list Tracking jaguars, diving with sharks, climbing cliffs in Africa, photographing gorillas, bicycling across the Serengeti and finding cannibals on remote and forbidden islands are all part of his Travel Quest

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: Life Hacks
programme.desc: DIY projects are not that difficult, you need to find an interesting one to start creating your own. To help you, here we bring you a few fantastic inspirations.

programme.title: Seaclopedia
programme.desc: This Program reference work or summary that provides summary of information from all branches of knowledge or from a certain field.

programme.title: 3-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 3 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 4 - 7 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Sirkuit Nasional Bulu Tangkis 2024 (Tapping)
programme.desc: PBSI Sirkuit Nasional is one of the national scale badminton events held in Indonesia. Every year, this event is always held in several series, in several places in Indonesia. Sirkuit Nasional is used as a benchmark for developing national badminton achievements.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Earth On Edge
programme.desc: Documentary series about the climate crisis. We travel to Iceland, Greenland, Denmark, Japan and California to explore the effects of a warming planet. While the situation is dire, there is hope. Brilliant minds are coming up with solutions that could show us a new way. As we stand on the edge, what is our next step?

programme.title: Ruang Makna
programme.desc: A program that discusses the meaning of words that are often heard and used every day in the context of life. Presented concisely and easy to understand.

programme.title: Sea Morning Show (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Morning Show delivers up to-date news, live reports, talk shows and features about Indonesia and also Southeast Asia which airs daily 6 - 9 am.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: Luxe Asia
programme.desc: In the new season, Asia's most exclusive series returns to showcase the finest experiences and most luxurious living trends in the region. From the Waldorf Hotel in Shanghai, to Singapore's multi-billion dollar luxury goods market including custom made suits, cars and jets, Luxe Asia provides exclusive insight into Asia's high life.

programme.title: Bulletproof
programme.desc: From a quadriplegic adrenaline junkie getting his paragliding licence, to a double-amputee organizing ski camps, this is a series of stories about inspiring people whose lives have been turned upside down and then re-built as a consequence of a tragic accident. We revisit the accident scene to understand what happened, and learn about their recoveries.

programme.title: Impact: Stories Of Asia
programme.desc: This series celebrates these triumphs through moving illustrations of the power of human will against adversity. Whilst providing a holistic portrait of poverty issues across Asia ranging from HIV in Cambodia to desertification in Mongolia, the series also presents a myriad of workable solutions, ranging from micro-financing to slum development to educational and cultural preservation initiatives.

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: No Luggage Asia
programme.desc: From the stunning natural beauty of the Maldives, Sri Lanka and Bali to the pagodas of Cambodia, cherry blossom season in Japan and the temples of Myanmar, this strand of the No Luggage franchise gives viewers an up close and personal experience of local life, religious practices and flora and fauna in each destination.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Travel Quest is an eco travel adventure series showcasing some of the most exciting, exotic and often dangerous places in earth Host Bill Ball, a true " challenges himself in each episode as he attempts to check an adventure, thrill or rare animal off his personal bucket list Tracking jaguars, diving with sharks, climbing cliffs in Africa, photographing gorillas, bicycling across the Serengeti and finding cannibals on remote and forbidden islands are all part of his Travel Quest

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: Finding Dish
programme.desc: Program contains light information about the world of health and food combining

programme.title: Stories Of Taste
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: The Meat And Greed
programme.desc: The food show that is a carnivore's delight, Meat %26 Greed is back for a sumptuous season 2! Join us on a savoury food crawl as we hunt down the best and tastiest meat dishes Singapore has to offer; sizzling charcoal barbecues, fork tender smoked beef briskets, succulent flamegrilled chicken, crispy whole roast pig, juicy handmade burgers, delectable steamed seafood and much more! In this flavourful protein-packed series, you know you will be getting the lion's share.

programme.title: Podsea
programme.desc: A podcast program where we talk to someone famous in the past. We do little throwbacks about a certain period of time, talk about music, movies, or trends that were happening in the past, to reminisce about some memorable old stories.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: Tanka Poetry
programme.desc: The program introduces various Tanka created by viewers while learning and having fun with engaging guests.

programme.title: German in a Happy Mood
programme.desc: Let’s learn simple and easy-to-remember phrases, looking at a modern Europe that cherishes its history and traditions while pursuing a lifestyle that fits its stature. Furthermore, we explore tips for "happiness" and various forms of "joy" through the unique European way of thinking and values behind their languages and lifestyles.

programme.title: Feeling English! Favorite Phrases Selected from Data
programme.desc: A new type of English lesson that improves your English conversational skills in only 10 minutes a day using selected essential phrases from a database of over 100 million sample conversations by native English speakers.

programme.desc: This children's program includes a puppet show, cartoon, music, and gymnastics in which children can participate.

programme.title: Drama Serial "Carnation" Encore Eps. 26
programme.desc: A heroine born into a kimono store family in Kishiwada, Osaka, holds admiration for clothing and discovers a sewing machine. Despite her father’s opposition, she is undeterred and pursues her passion for dressmaking. She opens a store at age 20 and gets married, but her husband dies in the war. The story depicts the life of a powerful woman who becomes a pioneer of Japan’s fashion design while overcoming many obstacles.

programme.desc: The Two Sisters is a tragic story of two sisters separated during childhood because of their parents' divorce. By a twist of fate, they meet each other again as mother-in-law and daughter-in-law.

programme.title: Iron Family - EP 2
programme.desc: A romantic black comedy takes place at "Darim family's laundry" where they dry-clean money instead of clothes.

programme.title: Animals Are Incredible - EP 2
programme.desc: A reality program that shows a daily life full of laughter and tears with pets as companions and families through an "anicam" (animal+cam).

programme.title: The Seasons W
programme.desc: On Saturday night, when the end of one week meets the start of another, this show will bring you music and stories that will soothe your worries and concerns.

programme.title: The Best of Immortal Songs
programme.desc: The true classic of the century is born again! The legendary classic is reinterpreted by the best idol groups in Korea. Don't miss out on the heart-moving moments that transcend generations.

programme.title: Naked Fireman - EP 2
programme.desc: There is a young firefighter who's got a bad temper. One day, he has to quickly make a large sum of money. Having no other choice, he decides to work part time as a nude art model. His employer is an art school student who is very rich. And, it seems like she is hiring him for a different purpose!

programme.title: Music Bank K-Chart
programme.desc: Follow the latest trend in the Korean music scene through the K-chart, a summary of the week's hottest songs.

programme.title: Good Doctor - EP 9
programme.desc: A medical drama about a man with autistic disorder, who has mentality of 10-year-old, overcomes bias and discrimination by the society and becomes a pediatrician by utilizing his exceptional abilities that the illness brings.

programme.title: KBS WORLD News Today
programme.desc: KBS World Daily English News Anchor : Choi Kyu-yeon

programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. programme.title: Scoop 2024
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Arabian Days %26 Nights
programme.desc: Follow host Carina Leung to Dubai, Abu Dhabi in the United Arab Emirates, as well as Qatar, Oman, Bahrain and other Middle Eastern countries to experience local life first-hand!

programme.title: Big City Shop 2024
programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to the latest products on fashion, skin care, make-up, health care, baby care and much more! The hosts will demonstrate and try on the products, and also invite related experts to share their knowledge.

programme.title: ICAC Investigators 2024 - EP 3
programme.desc: ICAC Investigators 2024 centres around the dangers of corruption, while also showcasing the indomitable and fearless spirit of the anti-corruption staff.

programme.title: Scam Alert!

programme.title: EXTRA
programme.desc: Keep up with the news on the entertainment circle in Hong Kong and all over the world, with reports on the latest drama series, movies, concert highlights, award ceremonies and more.

programme.title: Hands Up

programme.title: Shanghai AppPacker
programme.desc: Our hosts are in Shanghai, which is known as the Magic City. They will use different mobile travel apps to navigate the area, testing the credibility of online reviews!

programme.title: Eyes On Concern Groups
programme.desc: There are many types of online groups, with various topics like food, entertainment, hobbies and relationships attracting the attention of netizens. Our hosts follow some highly-popular groups in depth, discussing and fact-checking the information.

programme.title: The Legend of Xiao Chuo - EP 4
programme.desc: Xiao Yanyan and Han Derang are childhood sweethearts, but get separated when she is sent to the palace as the consort of Yelu Xian. With wit and dedication, she transforms into the most powerful woman in the Liao dynasty.

programme.title: Strange Tales of Tang Dynasty II - To The West - EP 8
programme.desc: Set during Tang Dynasty's peak, the sequel follows Lu Lingfeng (Yang Xuwen), head of the Dali Temple, and Su Wuming (Yang Zhigang), a Qianling official as they leave Chang'an for the west on a fearless journey to unravel mysterious cases amid lurking dangers.

programme.title: Strange Tales of Tang Dynasty II - To The West - EP 9
programme.desc: Set during Tang Dynasty's peak, the sequel follows Lu Lingfeng (Yang Xuwen), head of the Dali Temple, and Su Wuming (Yang Zhigang), a Qianling official as they leave Chang'an for the west on a fearless journey to unravel mysterious cases amid lurking dangers.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1607
programme.desc: HUNG SHU-KAN (Lau Dan) built his own logistics business from scratch and now everything is in order. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, HUNG YUEK-SHUI (Koni Lui), is still single. She and her little prodigy sister, HUNG SUM-YUE (Andrea So), often fight over small things, putting their father in dilemmas.

programme.title: Raising The Bar - EP 17
programme.desc: A group of barristers, pupil barristers, and trainee solicitors are determined to implement the rule of law in pursuit of their dreams, during which, however, they face great difficulties and challenges. The legendary couple in the legal profession, barrister FAN CHI-NGAI (Ben Wong) and his wife CHEUNG WAI-WAN (Elaine Yiu), have many pupils. Among them, TONG CHING-CHI (Grace Chan), FOK TSZ-YING (Jeannie Chan), and CHOW TSZ-BOK (Louis Cheung) are CHI-NGAI's favorite ones.

programme.title: Sinister Beings - EP 27
programme.desc: Hui Chun-sum (Ruco Chan) is an elite OCTB officer. He is fearless and competent. His boss thinks highly of him, and his colleagues really admire him. But his ultimate dream is to join SDU. Another elite OCTB officer Shum Wai-lik (Ben Wong) has a shrewd mind and extensive experience. Although the duo have different approaches, but they are like-minded and ideally complement each other. Police suffer heavy casualties as they are ambushed by thugs.

programme.title: Legend of the Condor Heroes (I), The - EP 7
programme.desc: This costume Kung -fu-packed serialized drama is an authentic adaptation of the most selling Kung-fu novel by the well renowned novelist KAM YUNG. This long-series has been divided into 3 parts, each of these evolves around individual story lines and denotes a separate phase. Every part is complete in itself, yet, together they form a coherent whole._x000D_The story is set in the Sung Dynasty, when the KAM and YEUN monarchy are both invading South._x000D_YEUNG and KWOK are two sworn brothers.

programme.title: Virtues of Harmony II - EP 71
programme.desc: In the early 1980s’, everyone knows about GUCCI (SIT KA YIN, NANCY). She was the most beautiful woman in the police force and many men were after her. After getting married, GUCCI took good care of her family, especially after her husband died. She brought up her step-sons, NIN (LAM MAN LUNG, FRANKIE) and YUE (TSE TIN WAH, MICHAEL), and step-daughter, YAT (CHAN YIN HANG, JOYCE). She also manages the restaurant, ‘Honey Cave’, which her husband has left her.

programme.title: Black Heart White Soul - EP 24
programme.desc: A robbery case subtly interweaves the fate of three strangers, a barrister in a wheelchair KO CHIT-HANG (Kwok Chun On), a Hong Kong girl TAM MEI-CHING (Kristal Tin) and District Crime Unit detective CHEUNG LAP-FAN (Ron Ng). Implicated by her gangster boyfriend, MEI-CHING is charged with attempted robbery and is found guilty. Although CHIT-HANG, as the lawyer representing MEI-CHING, fails to exculpate her from the charge, the two fall in love with each other.

programme.title: Black Heart White Soul - EP 25
programme.desc: A robbery case subtly interweaves the fate of three strangers, a barrister in a wheelchair KO CHIT-HANG (Kwok Chun On), a Hong Kong girl TAM MEI-CHING (Kristal Tin) and District Crime Unit detective CHEUNG LAP-FAN (Ron Ng). She brought up her step-sons, NIN (LAM MAN LUNG, FRANKIE) and YUE (TSE TIN WAH, MICHAEL), and step-daughter, YAT (CHAN YIN HANG, JOYCE). She also manages the restaurant, ‘Honey Cave’, which her husband has left her.

programme.title: Black Heart White Soul - EP 24
programme.desc: A robbery case subtly interweaves the fate of three strangers, a barrister in a wheelchair KO CHIT-HANG (Kwok Chun On), a Hong Kong girl TAM MEI-CHING (Kristal Tin) and District Crime Unit detective CHEUNG LAP-FAN (Ron Ng). Implicated by her gangster boyfriend, MEI-CHING is charged with attempted robbery and is found guilty. Although CHIT-HANG, as the lawyer representing MEI-CHING, fails to exculpate her from the charge, the two fall in love with each other.

programme.title: Black Heart White Soul - EP 25
programme.desc: A robbery case subtly interweaves the fate of three strangers, a barrister in a wheelchair KO CHIT-HANG (Kwok Chun On), a Hong Kong girl TAM MEI-CHING (Kristal Tin) and District Crime Unit detective CHEUNG LAP-FAN (Ron Ng). Implicated by her gangster boyfriend, MEI-CHING is charged with attempted robbery and is found guilty. Although CHIT-HANG, as the lawyer representing MEI-CHING, fails to exculpate her from the charge, the two fall in love with each other.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1608
programme.desc: HUNG SHU-KAN (Lau Dan) built his own logistics business from scratch and now everything is in order. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, HUNG YUEK-SHUI (Koni Lui), is still single. She and her little prodigy sister, HUNG SUM-YUE (Andrea So), often fight over small things, putting their father in dilemmas.

programme.title: Raising The Bar - EP 18
programme.desc: A group of barristers, pupil barristers, and trainee solicitors are determined to implement the rule of law in pursuit of their dreams, during which, however, they face great difficulties and challenges. The legendary couple in the legal profession, barrister FAN CHI-NGAI (Ben Wong) and his wife CHEUNG WAI-WAN (Elaine Yiu), have many pupils. Among them, TONG CHING-CHI (Grace Chan), FOK TSZ-YING (Jeannie Chan), and CHOW TSZ-BOK (Louis Cheung) are CHI-NGAI's favorite ones.

programme.title: Sinister Beings - EP 28
programme.desc: Hui Chun-sum (Ruco Chan) is an elite OCTB officer. He is fearless and competent. His boss thinks highly of him, and his colleagues really admire him. But his ultimate dream is to join SDU. Another elite OCTB officer Shum Wai-lik (Ben Wong) has a shrewd mind and extensive experience. Although the duo have different approaches, but they are like-minded and ideally complement each other. Police suffer heavy casualties as they are ambushed by thugs.

programme.title: Legend of the Condor Heroes (I), The - EP 8
programme.desc: This costume Kung -fu-packed serialized drama is an authentic adaptation of the most selling Kung-fu novel by the well renowned novelist KAM YUNG. This long-series has been divided into 3 parts, each of these evolves around individual story lines and denotes a separate phase. Every part is complete in itself, yet, together they form a coherent whole._x000D_The story is set in the Sung Dynasty, when the KAM and YEUN monarchy are both invading South._x000D_YEUNG and KWOK are two sworn brothers.

programme.title: Virtues of Harmony II - EP 73
programme.desc: In the early 1980s’, everyone knows about GUCCI (SIT KA YIN, NANCY). She was the most beautiful woman in the police force and many men were after her. After getting married, GUCCI took good care of her family, especially after her husband died. She brought up her step-sons, NIN (LAM MAN LUNG, FRANKIE) and YUE (TSE TIN WAH, MICHAEL), and step-daughter, YAT (CHAN YIN HANG, JOYCE). She also manages the restaurant, ‘Honey Cave’, which her husband has left her.

programme.title: Cop Shop Babes
programme.desc: Island East Police Station headed by Madam Lui is known for its "Cop Shop Babes" as all the officers there are female. Two police officers, Beer and Satay, apply for an internal transfer to this station in order to approach the girls. It is at this time that the police receives a bomb threat - can they resolve the case?

programme.title: Troublesome Night II
programme.desc: The sequel features three paranormal stories about three radio DJs: Fai, Chai and Sam. Fai regrets asking his listener to commit suicide and ends up killing himself. Chai and his friends encounter scary events in a boat trip after saving a woman from boat wreckage. Sam is haunted by a ghost whom he stumbled upon during a car accident.

programme.title: Doubles Cause Troubles
programme.desc: Two squabbling cousins find themselves in more trouble than they can imagine after their tenant ends up dead. The gangsters and the police are both after them, and they have no idea what they have done wrong!

programme.title: Sex Beyond The Grave
programme.desc: During World War II, a singer was raped and killed by Master Tao during her escape, with all her valuables stolen as well. Since then, the Tao's house became haunted. Years later, Master Tao's descendant sells the house to a young couple to pay off a massive gambling debt, but the couple soon discover that it is haunted by the vengeful spirit...

programme.title: Expect The Unexpected
programme.desc: As the OCB team tracks down three amateur thieves who robbed a jewellery store, they encounter the wanted ferocious gangsters and hunt both down at the same time. The team celebrates their success when the gangsters are caught in a fierce battle, but it is at this time that the amateur thieves on the run show up and something unexpected happens...

programme.title: The Longest Nite
programme.desc: Two triad leaders, George and Kei, negotiate to join forces. As a bounty of $5 million is put on killing George, Kei assigns Sam, a corrupt cop who is also his right-hand man, to stop the killers. In the process, Sam meets a bald killer Tony, who stalks him and causes him troubles. When Sam realizes he is being set up, it was already too late...

programme.title: Love in a Fallen City
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name by the famous novelist Eileen Chang and directed by the equally acclaimed director Ann Hui, this romance story depicts the challenging relationship between an introverted Shanghai divorcee and a cynical Malaysian playboy during the Japanese invasion of Hong Kong in the 1940s. Will the lovers be together in the end?

programme.title: Eighth Happiness
programme.desc: A breakdown in the telephone system leads three brothers to find their love respectively. The eldest falls in love with a charming divorcee whom he dislikes initially. Hiding from his girlfriend, the flirtatious second brother falls in love with another gorgeous girl. The shy youngest brother is in love with a pretty girl he first met in a park.

programme.title: Justice, My Foot!
programme.desc: Chow stars as Sung, a lawyer who uses any means necessary to help his wealthy clients escape the law. Sung retires to the countryside when urged by his wife, but when Mrs Sung encounters a woman whose husband's death has been covered up by corrupted officials, Sung returns to the court for justice to be served.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision...

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Small time thief King Kong steals the mob's jewels but leads the police to believe that it is done by famous thief White Glove. Officer Baldy is to investigate the case with the help of Superintendent Ho but King Kong is forced to work with Baldy when White Glove comes for the jewels. Can King Kong finally save the day?

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh
programme.desc: When a young housewife's debt-ridden, philandering husband leaves her with a mountain of tax debts, a security guard is hired by the tax authority to guard the assets, but he starts falling for her instead.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Ma Wing Jing and his brother arrive in Shanghai to make their fortune. Befriending a powerful mobster Tam, Ma is given his nightclub when he saves Tam's life. Ma's fortune rises but he must overcome the corruption and violence to survive.

programme.title: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: An old lady died after mysteriously falling off a building and her ghost appears to haunt the place. This freaked out the security guards, who invite ghostbuster Leo and his female assistant to help. In the process, Leo finds out that the old lady was killed by her son and daughter in law. To rest her soul, Leo promises to bring the couple to justice.

programme.title: Wu Yen
programme.desc: The lustful Emperor Qi bumps into the beautiful outlaw warrior Wu Yen by chance and the two fall in love at first sight. However, an ugly mark suddenly appears on Wu Yen's face, scaring the Emperor away. This turns out to be a curse by the Fairy Enchantress in order to get between the two lovers...

programme.title: Happy Family
programme.desc: Sang, the only son of a rich family, falls in love with Kaka. They plan to get married, but Sang's father stops him from marrying her because she is his half-sister. Later, Sang falls in love with another girl who turns out to be his half-sister too. With Sang devastated, his mother unveils yet another big secret...

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the other's mole.

programme.title: Frugal Game
programme.desc: How do you overcome unemployment, divorce and crippling debt? Diana and Wai start a fake family to join a frugal game show on TV. To stimulate ratings, the producer forces the director, Tsui, to twist the game from an encouraging environment to a torturing one. As the fake family gets close to the prize, Tsui comes up with some bad ideas...

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack...

programme.title: How to Choose a Royal Bride
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager has arranged young and eligible women for Emperor Kangxi's selection. Kangxi is uninterested and becomes bored with the process. He decides to travel incognito as a businessman around the country when he meets Nalan Qiong Yao, who disguises herself as a man to avoid a possible arranged marriage with the Emperor...

programme.title: Shanghai Grand
programme.desc: Set in 1930s, Taiwanese fugitive Hui Man Keung befriends a small time mobster, Ding Lik, in Shanghai. The two join forces and become famous in the triad world. However, their relationship turns sour when both fall for the triad boss' daughter, Ching. Keung also discovers that Ching's father is responsible for the death of his Taiwanese comrades.

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, Tiger Wong is ambushed after he unwittingly took the Lousha Plaque but is saved by his brother Dragon Wong. They also befriended Turbo Shek during the fight and the trio forms a brotherhood. To avenge the death of the Dragon Gate masters, they train and vow to defeat Shibumi, the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: Hong Kong Playboys
programme.desc: Sheng is a rich playboy who lives a carefree and fun life with the ladies, until his mother decides that he should get married. Up against other lady killers in his quest to find Miss Right, Sheng must decide what he wants.

programme.title: The Bare-footed Kid
programme.desc: A poor, bare-footed young man from the countryside arrives in the city to work with the friend of his dead father. When their dye shop is burnt down by a local strongman, he decides to fight back to protect all of them and save the shop.

programme.title: Feel 100% 2003
programme.desc: Based on the popular comic book of the same name, Jerry and Lok are two best buddies with a common goal of finding their perfect girlfriend. Neither of them has ever encountered anything close to their "100% girl", until they meet the fabulous Cherie. The two decide to compete for her affections, but who will succeed?

programme.title: The Conman
programme.desc: King is one of the best conmen around but is caught out in a scam and gets a five-year jail time when he kills his opponent in self-defence. His wife leaves him with his unborn child, and when King gets out of jail, he goes back to his old ways, only this time, he fights for his family and friends.

programme.title: How to Pick Girls Up !
programme.desc: Xin, a helpless loser in love, calls in to a radio show hosted by DJ Tsang to ask desperately for help. A self-proclaimed love expert, Tsang takes it upon himself to make sure Xin meets girls and leads him on a series of absurd excursions into the wild and dangerous world of modern love.

programme.title: Crazy N' The City
programme.desc: An apathetic Hong Kong police officer, Chris, is weary of his 7-year patrol unit work life. Tension arises when an energetic and conscientious policewoman, Nam, becomes his partner. However, as time goes by, Nam's dedication and bravery in her line of duty begins to reignite Chris' passion for work and life.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this sumptuous version was said to be the most successful one. Loh Tih's looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: Heroes Of Sung
programme.desc: Heroes Of Sung stars one of the original kung fu ladies of the silver screen, Shih Szu, who plays swordswoman Meng Hung. She must work with Fan Tien-Fu, played by Lo Lieh to find and protect the royal seals of the Sung Dynasty. Shih's magnificent performance earned her the female hero role in another hit Dracula And The 7 Golden Vampires.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couple's brothel.

programme.title: Portrait In Crystal
programme.desc: Tragic deaths in the underworld cause leader "Yama" (Teng Wei-hao) to suspect a portrait in crystal with mysterious powers. He sends Hen Pan (Chen Hung) and Pai Pan (Hung Hsin-nan) to interrogate its creator, martial artist Lung Fei (Pai Piao)...

programme.title: The Killer Has No Return
programme.desc: Professional killer Lui goes to Malaysia after completing his mission of killing the big boss of a Hong Kong gang. His next target is a groom who is throwing his wedding banquet at a hotel in Chinatown. Just when Lui takes aim at his target, another victim instead of the groom is shot, and he becomes a scapegoat in this mystery assassination.

programme.title: The Lady Professional
programme.desc: Lily Ho is perfectly cast as a gun-for-hire who always gets her man - in more ways than one! The cast and crew shot on location in Japanese scenic spots such as Mount Fuji; and there are plenty of over-the-top thrills, as Lily even masquerades as a nun.

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: Dirty Ho
programme.desc: Master Wang, who is actually the 11th prince, poses as an antique connoisseur to hide his true identity. When he meets Dirty Ho, a witty con artist, Wang knows he has found the right man to help him untangle a royal succession plot...

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people's livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: After knowing his brother has killed the head of a rival triad, Jie takes the blame and was hunted by killers. With the help of Rambler Nan, Jie finally killed his enemies, but then found out that Nan is the one who has killed his father.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Chang's. On the Chang's farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: This is a martial arts epic directed by Chang Cheh. In the Sung Dynasty, the government is run by corrupt officials, so Sung Jiang gathers 108 outlaws at Mount Liang and establishes a band of patriotic heroes to end the repression of brutal overlords.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: Chiang Yi is blackmailed into a jewelry heist by his former boss, who threatens to expose his shady past. Complications arise when he discovers his first love works at the store.

programme.title: Apartment for Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies' youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: Rendezvous With Death
programme.desc: Sun Chung had been recognized as an expert comedy and crime thriller director, but he was to gain even greater acclaim for his soulful, powerful, intelligent, and beautifully-made martial arts epics. This stands alongside The Deadly Breaking Sword and The Kung-fu Instructor as one of his very best.

programme.title: Return Of The Dead
programme.desc: A long-awaited horror sequel after Enchanted Shadow, this is about three asylum inmates telling their stories. In story one, a husband and wife discover they should be careful what they wish for. A naked female ghost seeks revenge from her watery grave in story two, and a dead prostitute returns as a ghost in the last tale.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Yang Lin is a righteous hero who helps an unjustly imprisoned swordsman accused of stealing. They break out of prison together, and warn all evil men they know to watch out for a new deadly duo in town.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fete. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servant's confusion, threatening the couple's union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Yu family and the Green Dragon clan became enemies when the Yu daughter killed the clan head's son, who was a rapist and murderer. The Green Dragon leader wounds the head of the Yu family with his flying daggers, and a wandering swordsman saves the family using his own flying dagger skills. However, his allegiances and motives are unclear.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: That Man In Chang-an
programme.desc: The Han Emperor dies and his Empress Lu seizes the ruling power. She plots to kill the heir to the throne, Liu Heng, but the masked warrior discovers her plot and tips off Liu. Liu sends his princess to Chang An to ask for help. The masked warrior protects the princess from attackers along the way and supports Liu to become the new Emperor.

programme.title: Till the End of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: Ghosts Galore
programme.desc: Young Taoist priest Lu and his friend are nearly killed by a female ghost during an exorcism. Luckily, Master Lian saves their lives, so they beseech him to teach them his skills. When his friend is killed by ruthless ninjas, Lu decides to learn the ultimate witchcraft and teams up with his master to defeat them.

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: The Naval Commandos
programme.desc: The Chinese Navy is attempting to defend its coastline from a Japanese attack, they send their commando unit led by Cui Hsia into the mainland to enlist help to thwart the Japanese before they attack. The commandos enlist the help of Song San and Shiao Liu to kill the Japanese officers led by Shan Mao and destroy their attacking ships.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor's sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: The Imperial Tomb Raiders
programme.desc: The story revolves around a maverick, a band of woman warriors and a group of ruthless bandits. The maverick teams up with the woman warriors to battle the bandits seeking to raid the emperor's tomb.

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Citizens' Subjects
programme.desc: Citizens' Subjects utilizes the perspective of Taiwan people and Taiwan events to tell the stories of Taiwan. It takes a light-hearted, humorous approach to interpreting current affairs.

programme.title: Battle ATM
programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life! Guests can win money by taking three rounds of intellectual challenges from the ATM, turn wisdom into money!_x000D_Futuristic program scenes with video game clearing concept, where challengers engage in the intellectual competition to switch on the ATM. Those who won goes to the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: Call Me By Fire 4: Preview
programme.desc: In this season, the show takes a fresh twist by inviting 34 diverse guests, who are divided into the Older Brothers and Younger Brothers teams. Get ready for intense music battles, vibrant stage acts, and a blend of camaraderie and competition among the brothers, all shining brightly!

programme.title: Chaozhou Flavor - EP 1
programme.desc: Embark on a journey through Chaozhou cuisine, where the flavors of tradition, local customs, and daily life merge to create a dynamic and vivid celebration of the region's culinary heritage.

programme.title: Flight To You - EP 24
programme.desc: The story follows an aspiring civil aviation pilot struggling to work with her cold and strict captain due to personality clashes. While experiencing several life-threatening aviation incidents, they learn to work together and grow to value each other.

programme.title: iWalker - EP 160
programme.desc: Follow bold and witty hosts in hunting down the best gourmet and attractions around the world!

programme.title: Brutally Young - EP 5
programme.desc: 18 years ago, a group of seven students were involved in the death of a gangster, later burying him in the woods. programme.title: European Le Mans Series 2024
programme.desc: The grid for the 2024 ELMS will feature a total of 43 cars, the largest ever field of LMP2s for the leading continental endurance championship.
